title: riches
comment: Material possessions and wealth. Scripture stresses that riches originate from God: used wisely, they can be a blessing; used foolishly, they can lead people away from God.

children.title: riches, nature of
children.comment: God has created an abundance of good things.  Those who have material wealth should understand its true nature and acknowledge God.

children.title: All riches belong to God the Creator
God gives the ability to produce wealth
Riches may be a sign of God's blessing
Riches provide great opportunity for doing good
Riches are for this life only
riches, dangers of
children.comment: Material wealth can be a source of both physical and spiritual danger, against which believers are clearly warned to be on their guard.

children.title: Love of riches a root of many evils
They may lead to divided loyalty
They may hinder people's response to the gospel
They may cause unbelief and anxiety
They may lead people to forget God
Working for them may cause excessive tiredness
Enjoying them may lead to self-indulgence
Misusing them may foster oppression and injustice
riches, believers' attitudes towards
children.comment: God entrusts some of his people with material wealth.  If this is to be a blessing, it must be used in God-honouring ways.

children.title: Believers may be blessed with riches
Riches can be a blessing from God
The attitude of believers towards riches
They acknowledge that their riches come from God
They devote their riches to God's service
They support gospel work and workers
They do not trust in riches
They do not set their heart on riches
riches, ungodly use of
children.comment: Ungodly people often make the possession of wealth a priority. They do not understand the true nature of wealth, and they do not realise that they will have to face God in judgment.

children.title: They often obtain their riches unjustly
They accumulate and hoard their riches
The ungodly suffer difficulties because of their riches
The ungodly, like all people, must leave their riches to others
Jesus Christ warned the rich of their danger
riches, spiritual
children.comment: Out of his infinite abundance God gives his people spiritual treasure. This, much more valuable than material wealth, is to be held in the highest esteem and sought after eagerly.

children.title: God bestows spiritual riches on believers
Christians need to appreciate their spiritual riches
Christians need to store up treasure in heaven
